title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 July 2015 - XWiki
content:
<woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
00:04 <Ramona1> has quit

08:15 <\_cjd\_> has joined #xwiki

09:17 <Bugen\_do> has joined #xwiki  
11:11 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:30 <abusenius\_> has joined #xwiki  
12:14 <abusenius\_> has quit  
12:29 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
12:32 <vmassol> fixing build on platform  
12:33 <abusenius> @sdumitriu you have sent me some strange url on skype, can it be that your account has been hacked?  
12:33 <vmassol> abusenius: same here, I think he got hacked  
12:35 <vmassol> and hi abusenius, long time no talk :)  
12:35 <vmassol> hope all is going well for you!  
12:35 <abusenius> hi :) yea, busy working  
12:37 <abusenius> its nice to see xwiki evolving, but I have no time to catch up with it  
12:37 <vmassol> abusenius: are you using xwiki?  
12:39 <abusenius> no, privatly I don't need it, and for the work, I wish we would instead of sharepoint :)  
12:39 <vmassol> :)  
13:36 <sdumitriu> abusenius: Very likely  
13:36 <sdumitriu> I haven't been using Skype in a long time  
13:36 <sdumitriu> Thanks for the notice  
14:38 <martinus\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:40 <\_cjd\_> It's kind of interesting  
14:41 <\_cjd\_> it goes to http://web.skype.com.usaname.ru/ which generates a url with javascript and the url is something like: http://egdhegbg.com-sq4.net/?a=272277&c=wl\_con&jlcedeejjh  
14:43 <\_cjd\_> it's generated with Math.random() so it doesn't seem to have any meaning other than  com-sq4.net/?a=272277&c=wl\_con  
14:44 <\_cjd\_> but it's broken now, 403 .. so I didn't get to the part where it asks me to enter my skype password :)  
14:57 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
15:13 <vmassol> :)  
15:13 <vmassol> I stopped before the end of the various redirects…  
15:24 <Ramona1> has quit
